alert.note: Alert for Crisp; Dodge; Jefferson; Johnson; Laurens; Pulaski; Washington; Wilcox (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 04 at 8:54AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Laurens, Dodge, southeastern Pulaski, Wilcox, southeastern Washington, Johnson, southeastern Jefferson and southeastern Crisp Counties through 930 AM EST... At 854 AM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from 6 miles east of Oconee to Gresston to Arabi, and moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Dublin, Eastman, Abbeville, Wrightsville, East Dublin, Wadley, Chester, Rochelle, Milan, Adrian, Arabi, Dexter, Dudley, Cadwell, Pineview, Harrison, Rhine, Chauncey, Pitts and Rentz. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon EST for central and east central Georgia. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 200 PM EST for central and east central Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Crisp; Dodge; Jefferson; Johnson; Laurens; Pulaski; Washington; Wilcox
